Hi Cantera-users,
I'm writing to get some help with the cantera reactor objects. I do 
some transient reactor network simulation. One of the reactors in the 
network is supposed to be a gibbs minimizer. Therefore I take after 
every "advance"-command the gasobject out of the reactor and 
performed an equilibrate(gas,'UV') and returned it back in the 
reactor. I would prefer a simultaneously solution of the gibbs 
minimizing in this reactor. That way I do the calculations the size 
of the time steps (`advance') is limited to very small value to avoid 
convergence problems. If anybody has some suggestions to overcome 
these limitations I will appreciate it.

Thanks
   Albrecht
